arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّيْ فِيْهِ عَلَى صِيَامِهِ وَقِيَامِهِ
وَجَنِّبْنِيْ فِيْهِ مِنْ هَفَوَاتِهِ وَ آثَامِهِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] help me observe fasting and do acts of worship,
And keep me away on this day from slips and sins,
And grant me reference to You throughout it,
Out of Your guiding to success; O the Guide of the misled ones.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wajannibnī fīhi min hafawātihi wa āthāmih
